field.name: iMaxSkillPoint
field.desc: Max skill point the player can put in this Skill

field.name: iDescriptionInt
field.desc: A whole number that can be inserted into the description using formatting. If non 0 it will not use the float value.

field.name: fDescriptionFloat
field.desc: A floating point number that can be inserted into the description using formatting. Ignored if the description int is non-zero.
